title: France
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 323 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 570L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Z
description: France is home to the Eiffel Tower, but many other things make this country special. From famous food to rich history, France will open student's eyes to the wonders of this European country.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
